heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
contactCommunityText: Become part of our community and stay up to date with our ceremonies and events. Follow us on our social networks for inspiring content and updates.
footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at this time. Please check back soon.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: A journey into your inner self.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the dedicated individuals who will accompany you on your healing journey. Each of our guides brings deep wisdom, compassion, and experience to ensure a safe and supportive space.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine, a sacred brew made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). It is known for its profound visionary effects and its ability to facilitate deep emotional, mental, and spiritual healing. At 'The Art of Healing,' we honor this ancient tradition, offering a safe and respectful space for you to experience its transformative power.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca works at a neurological level, primarily through the DMT (dimethyltryptamine) present in Chacruna, which is activated by the MAO inhibitors in the vine. This combination allows DMT to access the brain, inducing expanded states of consciousness. During this process, it's common to access deep memories, gain insights into personal patterns, and feel a sense of connection with the universe. It is a powerful tool for self-knowledge and releasing emotional blockages.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than just a substance, Ayahuasca is considered by indigenous cultures to be a teacher or a wise spirit that guides the individual through their inner world. Each ceremony is a unique dialogue with this plant intelligence. It shows you what you need to see, not necessarily what you want to see, in order to heal and grow. Its guidance is loving yet direct, always aiming to lead you toward greater integrity and harmony.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and path. Many participants report a deep sense of clarity and a renewed sense of purpose after the ceremony.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release past traumas, fears, and emotional blockages that hold you back. Ayahuasca allows you to confront and heal deep wounds in a safe and supportive environment.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deeper connection with yourself, others, and the universe. Feel the unity of all life and rediscover your place in the cosmos.
groupCeremonyDescription: Group ceremonies offer a powerful collective energy. Sharing the experience with others creates a field of mutual support and healing, where each participant contributes to the strength of the circle. It is an opportunity to connect with others on a deep and authentic level.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies. This format allows for a more direct focus on your personal intentions, with the exclusive attention of our guides to delve deeper into your healing process.
preparationProcessDescription: Preparation is key. It begins with a specific diet and abstinence from certain substances to purify your body and mind.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The heart of the journey. A sacred space where you meet the medicine under the guidance and care of our facilitators.
experienceProcessDescription: Navigate your inner world. Ayahuasca can reveal visions, emotions, and deep insights for your healing.
integrationProcessDescription: The process continues after the ceremony. We support you in integrating your experiences for lasting change.
dietTitle: The Diet: Nourishing Body and Spirit
dietSubtitle: A clean diet before and after the ceremony is essential for a safe and profound experience. We recommend following these guidelines for at least 3-7 days before and after.
allowedFoodsList: Whole grains like brown rice, quinoa, and oats
Lean meats (chicken, turkey, fish), grilled or steamed
Water, herbal teas, and coconut water
prohibitedFoodsList: Spicy, fried, processed, or high-fat foods
Sexual activity (abstinence is recommended to conserve energy)
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental and emotional state is as important as your physical preparation. Here are some suggestions.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open the heart. This will help you navigate the experience with greater serenity.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what brings you to the ceremony. What would you like to heal, understand, or release? Set clear intentions but remain open to what the medicine has to show you.
reflectionDescription: Writing down your thoughts and feelings before and after the ceremony can be a powerful tool for processing and understanding your journey.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring intense emotions to the surface. It is important to be willing to feel and release whatever comes up, without judgment. Trust the process and the support of the guides. Remember that every emotion is an opportunity to heal.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: For your comfort and to contribute to the sacred space, we recommend bringing the following items.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable and warm clothing in layers (you might feel cold)
Blanket, pillow, and yoga mat or sleeping pad
A personal item for your altar (optional)
essentialsList: Flashlight with a red light (if you have one)
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMinLength: The {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters long.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent you a verification email.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover what Ayahuasca is, its origins, benefits, and how it can be a powerful ally on your path of self-discovery and healing.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the facilitators who will accompany you. Their experience and dedication are key to creating a safe and trusting environment.
preparationCtaDescription: Preparation is essential for a profound experience. Learn about the recommended diet and practices to arrive in the best condition.
promptRegisterDescription: Register to reserve your spot in our ceremonies and receive exclusive content on healing and spiritual growth.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please complete this questionnaire with complete honesty. This information is confidential and will help us ensure the ceremony is a safe and beneficial experience for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high/low blood pressure, diabetes)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medications, especially antidepressants (SSRIs, MAOIs) or other psychiatric drugs?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list the medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of serious mental health conditions (such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please specify your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Do you have previous experience with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive medicinal plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention or reason for participating in an Ayahuasca ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I'm seeking to heal emotional wounds, find my purpose, overcome fears, etc.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Thank you for completing your information. We have saved your answers securely.
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save your answers. Please try again.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your information has been saved.
dialogSuccessTitle: All Set for the Next Step!
dialogSuccessDescription: You have completed your questionnaire. We now invite you to review the preparation guide to ensure you arrive at the ceremony in the best condition.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this page.
